thread.title: TIM Courtney
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Deutschland bewertet von TIM Courtney

author: TIM Courtney
title: TIM Courtney
text:
Sorry guys, not great I'm afraid...
Small bouquet, and the flowers were slightly shrivelled.
I guess with most people sending flowers, it's a pretty important event, so you want to have faith.
This was well under expectation, which I was able to see for myself, as I had the pleasure of coming face to face with the bouquet the day after delivery.
Will not do this again
